entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
